Summary: 5-6 amber spheres Near Linwood/ Lawrence KS
divs: sighting detailsmy wife and i were returning from a church event...i saw the lights brighter then fireworks and almost stationary 5-6 amber spheres crossed he road real slow not descending or mov ing with wind.. the gathered into a pentagon shape then started to sepereate going east and west till they disapeared .. we watched and then we said drove on.. staopped the car about 1\2 mile later and watched till they dissapereaed.. at first i thought it was fireworks .. then maybe balloons with lights in em.. but they wierd slow synchronized movement.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Linwood
This sighting has never been favorited.
